about.title: About - Saturne Lab
about.description: Discover Saturne Lab, data science experts dedicated to the development of the Democratic Republic of Congo. Our mission, vision and team.

hero.title: About Saturne Lab
hero.subtitle: Empowering institutions and businesses through data intelligence

story.title: Our Story
story.whyWeStartedDescription: Saturne Lab was established to address the growing need for reliable data collection, analysis, and economic intelligence across Africa. Governed by OHADA regulations and registered in the Democratic Republic of Congo, we combine legal rigor with technical excellence. Our founders, experienced data scientists and researchers, recognized that Africa's vast potential could be unlocked through better data utilization — building world-class analytics capabilities while developing sustainable local expertise.

mission.title: At Saturne Lab, we believe that reliable data is the foundation of progress.
mission.description: Our mission is to empower businesses and public institutions across Africa with trustworthy analytics, modern technology, and local expertise — transforming raw information into strategic advantage.
mission.vision: We operate at the intersection of data science, digital transformation, and economic intelligence, supporting decision-makers to plan, act, and innovate with confidence.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work and define our commitment to excellence

excellence.title: Data-Driven Excellence
excellence.description: We believe in the power of data to transform decision-making and drive sustainable growth across all sectors.

collaboration.title: Collaborative Partnership
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients as partners, ensuring solutions are tailored to their unique challenges and goals.

integrity.title: Quality & Integrity
integrity.description: We maintain the highest standards in data collection, analysis, and reporting while ensuring ethical practices.

impact.title: Local Impact
impact.description: We're committed to building data science capacity within DRC and contributing to the country's digital transformation.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced professionals passionate about data science and committed to DRC's development

matthieu.name: Matthieu Ndumbi
matthieu.bio: Master of Engineering in Electrical & Computer Engineering with experience in Data Science, AI, GIS and Bioinformatics. Former Postgraduate Researcher at Centre Borelli ENS Paris-Saclay.

jacques.name: Mevis-Jacques Bakole
jacques.bio: Master's in Finance and Mathematical Economics with expertise in financial engineering and large-scale data analysis. Supervised national census and analytical projects for ONIP, INS, and the World Bank.

maurice.name: Maurice Nkanka
maurice.bio: Specializes in business analytics and visualization. MBA from UNIKIN with focus on data-driven business strategy.

johan.name: Johan Mufuta
johan.bio: BSc in Computer Science with experience in software development and cloud computing. He is also a senior associate at J.P. MORGAN.

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can help transform your organization through data-driven insights

services.title: Our Services - Saturne Lab
services.description: Comprehensive data solutions tailored to local challenges in the Democratic Republic of Congo. From collection to strategic insights.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive data solutions tailored to local challenges

dataCollection.title: Data Collection & Processing
dataCollection.description: We design and execute data collection systems tailored to Africa's realities. Whether through field surveys, digital platforms, or automated sensors, we ensure that every data point collected is reliable, structured, and actionable.
features: Digital data pipelines (API, IoT, mobile apps)
Data cleaning, validation, and storage architectures

analytics.title: Analytics, Forecasting & Optimization
analytics.description: Our analysts transform raw data into foresight. Using advanced statistics, AI, and econometric modeling, we help organizations forecast trends, allocate resources efficiently, and measure impact.

consulting.title: Economic & Strategic Intelligence Consulting
consulting.description: We translate insights into action. Saturne Lab supports executives and policymakers with strategic recommendations grounded in data evidence — enabling smarter decisions and long-term impact.

digitalSolutions.title: Digital & Software Solutions
digitalSolutions.description: We build comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your specific needs. Our engineering team develops custom software applications, management systems, and digital platforms for enterprises, ministries, and institutions across various sectors.
features: Custom management systems (Hospital, E-learning, HR, etc.)
Web and mobile applications for various sectors
Monitoring and tracking systems (Forest, Environment, etc.)
Secure databases, cloud infrastructure & API integrations

training.title: Training & Capacity Building
training.description: We strengthen institutional capacity through practical workshops and technical upskilling. Our goal is to empower local teams to understand, manage, and leverage their own data assets.
features: Data analysis & visualization (Python, R, Power BI)

additional.title: Research Partnerships & Academic Support
additional.description: While our primary mission focuses on enterprises and institutions, we also provide analytical support to researchers, students, and universities.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: A structured approach for optimal results

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We understand your challenges, objectives, and technical requirements

strategy.title: Design & Strategy
strategy.description: We develop a tailored solution architecture and implementation roadmap

implementation.title: Development & Deployment
implementation.description: We build and deploy the solution with regular progress updates and testing

optimization.title: Support & Optimization
optimization.description: We provide ongoing support and continuous improvement for maximum impact
